content.question: How do the references to Laurentes populos and urbem Latini (line 4) anticipate the events of Books 7-12? Referring to one of these phrases, describe one specific event from these Books.

frqParts.text: How do the references to Laurentes populos and urbem Latini (line 4) anticipate the events of Books 7-12? Referring to one of these phrases, describe one specific event from these Books.

unit.text: 4: Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry and Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 1 and 2

skill.text: 2.B: Describe historical and cultural contexts of Latin texts.
